context.description: Use to set the preferences that servers will use for audio purposes.
Plays sound when an error occurs on the server, or whenever the server changes state (such as, changing from "Starting" to "Started").
Adjusts the volume of the sound played on your computer.
Lists the sounds events to which you can enable the sound. To enable sound for an event, select the check box beside the event.
To test a particular sound, select a sound and then click Play.
To choose a sound from a list of available sounds that are on your machine, select Browse.
To reset a particular sound to the workbench default one, select a sound and then click Reset.
